channel.title: javascript on Warm journeys of bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in javascript on Warm journeys of bits and bytes

item.title: Virtualization creating list
item.description: Virtualization creating list Firstly we need to crate index.html where we should link css and javascript files 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 <html lang="en"> <head> <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" /> </head> <body> <script src="./main.js"></script> </body> </html> Then we need a text input to receive the texts, a button to bind function to pass the text to dom by creating html elements an unordered list where we can insert list element in.
